attributes.action: Nominate Guido Fawkes as a peer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For services to politics.  Namely, bringing into the public arena issues of justice and liberty, an increase in public discourse and a reduction in voter apathy.

Guido Fawkes is an independent blogger who was the 2005 winner, Best Political Commentary - The Backbencher Political Weblog Awards (The Guardian).

His blog has over 400,000 page views in the month of January and this can be shown to be helping public discourse and reducing voter apathy.

We therefore believe these services to politics deserve recognition, and a position as a peer would greatly assist further reductions in apathy.

rejection.details: Guido Fawkes is not a real name.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
